name: How do you feel
description: Sit back and relax. There are some simple questions about your life.

questions.text: Walls. They're all around you. What color they are?

answers.text: WTF! There is no walls around me!

questions.text: How about celling? Do you like it?
Third question. Roof. Do you have any?

answers.text: Yesss, I have many of them. I like them. They like me too, I think.
